name: Spooky Scary Skelebones
description:
Welcome to Spooky Scary Skelebones!

Use WASD to move around

Look around with your mouse

Press E on a grave to venture into the underworld

Avoid the Thunder!

Themes incorporated - Thunder, 3D Movement, Gravestone

Designer - Jana Lehning

Artist - Kai Jaeschke

Programmer 1 - Philip Nees

Programmer 2 - Drew Beck

Music - Maja Milas
